description: I'm not gonna rail on this because it works exactly as it needs to but on Ubuntu with the Dash to Panel shell, it doesn't have badge notifications and I never know if my friends messaged me if I walked away

summary: Constantly on "RTC Connecting" when attempting to join VC

description: Great app, no problems with it.
This is Discord Alpha. If you want stability get regular Discord. If you want bleeding edge features and probably bugs, you're in the right place.

I could chat via text just fine but in voice chat, I couldn't be heard, nor could anyone hear me. Also, watching a stream from someone in my channel failed always. 

Ubuntu 21.10
Ryzen 7 3700x
32GB RAM
Radeon RX 6700 XT
Corsair Void Elite wireless headset
summary: Chat via text, Good. Voice chat, not so good

description: I say this as a guy who moved from team speak and mumble/plumble, Ive used the app for almost 6 years now.. I love it every thing about it, Though i have some changes i'd personally like it's not like the aplication sucks with out it.. But keep this in mind when looking at Discord-Canary.. It is not the app i am talking about, If you want what i'm talking about go download the normal discord.. This app is the Alpha Testing aplication, Simply put this one is janky and broken at times. So if you don't take this as the warning it is and download it anyways, Be forgiving for where it lacks for you.. Or where it just straight up faulters, It is meant to and while useing it your supposed to be in a specific discord server as well to help them fix these bugs as they come. So the devs can make their main app even better.
I CAN'T DOWNLOAD IT I DON'T KNOW WHY?
summary: THERE'S A PROBLEM IN THIS BECAUSE I CAN'T DOWNLOAD IT I DON'T KNOW WHY

description:
After i created my account, i couldn't even start to use my account. Discord immediately forced me to add a cell phone number to my account, even though i had successfully verified my email.

I cantacted the support and they told me, that i FORCED to permanently add a cell phone number to the account to use it.

I dont' have a cell phone number that i can use for discord. So i cant use their service at all...

I cant deven delete my account. I can't do anything now.
BTW: they collect all chats and sell them to AI companies.
Avoid discord!
Alguien q me diga pa q sirve esto xDE, no lo voy a instalar xd solo digan.
Esta app es segura, es el propio Discord pero una versión más temprana, tipo versión alpha.
